name: Lihon Gebre
bio: I am a passionate full stack software engineer based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia specializing in backend development and DevOps work. I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Addis Ababa University and have specialized further in software engineering through ALX, an intensive online program. On GitHub under the username gelftheshot, you can see some of my past work building real-time chat applications, e-commerce solutions, inventory management systems, and more using technologies like the MERN stack, Django, Next.js, Python, and more. I am particularly interested in artificial intelligence and integrating models to solve complex problems. In addition to programming skills, I have experience in DevOps practices like Docker and cloud platforms from AWS. I am always looking to apply my full stack expertise in new and innovative ways and am excited to take on new engineering challenges.

projects.name: RateMyProfAI
projects.description: An innovative AI assistant leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology to help students make informed decisions about professors and courses. This tool analyzes vast amounts of data to provide personalized recommendations, enhancing the academic decision-making process.

projects.name: Inventory Management App
projects.description: A comprehensive inventory tracking solution developed with Next.js and Firebase. This app showcases proficiency in React, real-time databases, and serverless technologies, offering businesses an efficient way to manage their stock levels and supply chain.

projects.name: Flashcards with AI
projects.description: An intelligent flashcard study application that combines React with AI technologies. This app enhances learning by adapting to user performance and generating personalized study materials, demonstrating the integration of modern web technologies with machine learning.

projects.name: AI Customer Support
projects.description: A cutting-edge customer support application that offers quick, personalized responses to customer queries. It operates 24/7 and can escalate complex issues when needed, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction with intelligent support.
projects.technologies: Next.js, AI, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Firebase

projects.name: Convo Chatbot
projects.description: An advanced chat system that enables users to engage in conversations with various AI models. This project demonstrates proficiency in integrating multiple AI APIs and creating a user-friendly interface for human-AI interaction.
projects.technologies: Next.js, Natural Language Models, AI APIs

projects.name: Vibiro
projects.description: A private virtual office application featuring AI-powered workers, including an accountant. This innovative project showcases the ability to create complex, AI-driven business solutions that can automate and enhance various office functions.

projects.name: Simple Shell
projects.description: A basic shell implementation created for ALX, supporting common Unix commands. This project demonstrates proficiency in low-level programming, process management, and command-line interface design in C.

projects.name: Whisper (MERN Chat App)
projects.description: Real-time messaging platform built with MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js that demonstrates my ability to develop robust real-time features through the integration of modern JavaScript frameworks and Socket.io.

projects.name: ONLY_HERS E-Commerce Store
projects.description: A fully functional e-commerce website connecting vendors, social media influencers, and female shoppers. Only-Hers offers a curated product selection, influencer partnerships, and a seamless shopping experience.

projects.name: Academic Advisor AI
projects.description: A Next.js application designed to assist students in academic planning, finding professors, and getting career advice. Features include professor search, major advisor, and course planner, using Google Generative AI and Pinecone for personalized recommendations.

projects.name: Alx Study with AI
projects.description: An open-source study tool using AI, built with Next.js. This project helps students study with short notes and various materials, featuring automatically generated questions. It utilizes the Llama 3.1 8B model to provide an AI-powered educational experience.
